mapper.insert: insert into tbl_team (team_title, team_url, team_contact_email, team_intro, member_id) values(#{teamTitle}, #{teamUrl}, #{teamContactEmail}, #{teamIntro}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select id, team_title, team_url, team_contact_email, team_status, team_intro, member_id from tbl_team where team_title = #{teamTitle}
select id, team_title, team_url, team_contact_email, team_status, team_intro, member_id from tbl_team where team_url = #{teamUrl}
